vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MY_BANK.put (patch_13.sol#18-24):
	External calls:
	- LogFile.addMessage(msg.sender,msg.value,Put) (patch_13.sol#22)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Acc (patch_13.sol#23)
